examples: A rubber duck floated in the bath.

words: flotilla (only used for ducks that are swimming)
examples: A flotilla of ducks bobbed near the shore.
Every afternoon they went to the park to feed the ducks.
The ducks paddled furiously towards the bread.
Some species of duck dive for food, while others dabble for plants and insects near the surface.
A family of ducks waddled along the river bank.
Slice the duck breast and serve.
